insights.populationGrowth: Growing 2.2% with China border trade and eco-tourism.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 71% literacy with Chinese language programs.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 40%, border trade 30%, eco-tourism 15%, services 10%, government 5%.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional 55%, modern border housing 35%, tourism facilities 10%.

insights.precipitation: Very high 2,000mm with mountain flooding risks.
insights.extremeEvents: Mountain flash floods, landslides, border weather extremes.

recentDisasters.impact: China-Laos trade route flooded, economic losses

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: China-Laos economic corridor, mountain eco-tourism, ethnic diversity
